description: Numbers n such that 241*2^n+1 is prime.
links: Ray Ballinger & Wilfrid Keller, List of primes k.2^n + 1 for k < 300.
Index entries for sequences of n such that k*2^n-1 (or k*2^n+1) is prime
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: One more term (from the Ballinger-Keller web page) from _M. F. Hasler_, Apr 18 2007
